category: Sports Fair Committee Regulations/Article 20 (Request for reconsideration)
contents: Article 20 (Request for reconsideration) ① If an executive candidate whose reappointment is restricted pursuant to the resolution in Article 19 is dissatisfied with the result, he/she must prepare the purpose and reasons for requesting reconsideration and the method of verification, etc. and submit the request through the member sports organization or the member city/provincial sports association. You can apply for reconsideration to the Sports Council. Revised January 24, 2022. ② The application for reconsideration must be submitted to the Sports Association through the member sports organization or member city/provincial sports association within 7 days from the date of receiving notification of the committee's decision. Revised January 24, 2022. ③ The committee must deliberate and decide on the reconsideration application within 30 days from the date it is received by the Sports Council.
